class.name: ocgd_iges_writer
class.brief_description: OpenCASCADE IGES file writer for exporting 3D shapes and CAD data.
class.description:
The ocgd_iges_writer class provides comprehensive functionality for exporting OpenCASCADE shapes to IGES (Initial Graphics Exchange Specification) files. IGES is a widely-used CAD file format that enables the exchange of geometric and manufacturing data between different CAD systems.
This writer supports various IGES versions and can export shapes with colors, layers, and detailed geometric information. It provides extensive configuration options for precision control, entity type selection, and format compliance.
Key features: - Support for multiple IGES versions (1.0 through 5.3) - Color and layer export capabilities - BREP and analytical surface support - Configurable precision and tolerance settings - Entity type optimization - Validation and error handling - Configuration presets for common use cases
Example usage: ```gdscript var writer = ocgd_iges_writer.new_iges_writer() writer.set_write_colors(true) writer.set_precision_value(0.01) var success = writer.write_shape(my_shape, "output.iges") if not success: print("Error: " + writer.get_last_error()) ```

method.name: clear_last_error
method.description: Clears the last error message. Useful for resetting error state before performing new operations.

method.name: get_angular_tolerance
method.description: Returns the current angular tolerance value used for curve calculations during export.

method.name: get_author_name
method.description: Returns the author name included in the IGES file header.

method.name: get_convert_curves_to_bsplines
method.description: Returns whether curves are converted to B-splines during export.

method.name: get_convert_surfaces_to_bsplines
method.description: Returns whether surfaces are converted to B-splines during export.

method.name: get_current_configuration
method.description: Returns a dictionary containing all current writer configuration settings. Useful for saving and restoring configurations.

method.name: get_curve_tolerance
method.description: Returns the current curve tolerance value. Default is 0.01.

method.name: get_description
method.description: Returns the description text included in the IGES file header.

method.name: get_drafting_standard
method.description: Returns the drafting standard identifier. Default is "NONE".

method.name: get_global_scale
method.description: Returns the global scale factor applied to all geometry. Default is 1.0.

method.name: get_iges_file_info
method.description: Analyzes an existing IGES file and returns information about its structure and validity. Returns a dictionary with file properties.

method.name: get_iges_version
method.description: Returns the current IGES version number. Default is 11 (IGES 5.3).

method.name: get_last_error
method.description: Returns the last error message from write operations. Empty string indicates no error.

method.name: get_linear_tolerance
method.description: Returns the current linear tolerance value used for geometric calculations during export.

method.name: get_merge_surfaces
method.description: Returns whether surface merging is enabled during export.

method.name: get_model_space_units
method.description: Returns the model space units setting. Default is "MM" (millimeters).

method.name: get_model_units
method.description: Returns the model units setting. Default is "MM" (millimeters).

method.name: get_optimize_curves
method.description: Returns whether curve optimization is enabled during export. Default is true.

method.name: get_organization
method.description: Returns the organization name included in the IGES file header.

method.name: get_precision_value
method.description: Returns the current precision value for geometric calculations. Default is 0.01.

method.name: get_preprocessor_version
method.description: Returns the preprocessor version string. Default is "1.0".

method.name: get_quality_level
method.description: Returns the current quality level (1=low, 2=medium, 3=high). Quality level affects precision and tolerance settings.

method.name: get_supported_units
method.description: Returns an array of supported length units: ["MM", "M", "IN", "FT", "MI", "MU"].

method.name: get_supported_versions
method.description: Returns an array of supported IGES version numbers: [6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11].

method.name: get_surface_tolerance
method.description: Returns the current surface tolerance value. Default is 0.01.

method.name: get_system_identifier
method.description: Returns the system identifier included in IGES file headers. Default is "OpenCASCADE.gd".

method.name: get_unit_scale_factor
method.description: Returns the unit scale factor for unit conversions. Default is 1.0.

method.name: get_validate_on_write
method.description: Returns whether shape validation is performed before writing. Default is true.

method.name: get_write_analytical_surfaces
method.description: Returns whether analytical surfaces (planes, cylinders, etc.) are written as native IGES entities. Default is true.

method.name: get_write_brep_entities
method.description: Returns whether BREP (boundary representation) entities are included in exported IGES files. Default is true.

method.name: get_write_colors
method.description: Returns whether color information is included in exported IGES files. Default is true.

method.name: get_write_isoparametric_curves
method.description: Returns whether isoparametric curves are written to the IGES file.

method.name: get_write_layers
method.description: Returns whether layer information is included in exported IGES files. Default is true.

method.name: get_write_names
method.description: Returns whether shape names are included in exported IGES files. Default is true.

method.name: get_write_parameter_space_curves
method.description: Returns whether parameter space curves are written to the IGES file.

method.name: get_write_precision_mode
method.description: Returns whether precision mode is enabled for geometric calculations. Default is true.

method.name: get_write_statistics
method.description: Returns statistics about the last write operation, including configuration settings and any errors.

method.name: get_write_trimmed_surfaces
method.description: Returns whether trimmed surfaces are included in exported IGES files. Default is true.

method.name: is_valid_iges_file
method.description: Checks if the specified file is a valid IGES file by examining its header structure.

method.name: load_configuration
method.description: Loads writer configuration from a dictionary. The dictionary should contain configuration keys matching the writer's settings.

method.name: new_iges_writer
method.description: Factory method that creates and returns a new ocgd_iges_writer instance with default settings.

method.name: set_angular_tolerance
method.description: Sets the angular tolerance for curve calculations during export.

method.name: set_author_name
method.description: Sets the author name to be included in the IGES file header.

method.name: set_configuration_preset
method.description: Applies a predefined configuration preset. Available presets: "CAD_EXPORT", "MINIMAL", "HIGH_PRECISION".

method.name: set_convert_curves_to_bsplines
method.description: Sets whether to convert curves to B-splines during export. B-splines provide universal compatibility.

method.name: set_convert_surfaces_to_bsplines
method.description: Sets whether to convert surfaces to B-splines during export. B-splines provide universal compatibility.

method.name: set_curve_tolerance
method.description: Sets the tolerance value for curve calculations and optimization.

method.name: set_description
method.description: Sets a description to be included in the IGES file header.

method.name: set_drafting_standard
method.description: Sets the drafting standard identifier for the IGES file. Common values include "ANSI", "ISO", "JIS".

method.name: set_global_scale
method.description: Sets a global scale factor applied to all geometry during export.

method.name: set_iges_version
method.description: Sets the IGES version number. Supported versions range from 6 (IGES 1.0) to 11 (IGES 5.3).

method.name: set_linear_tolerance
method.description: Sets the linear tolerance for geometric calculations during export.

method.name: set_merge_surfaces
method.description: Sets whether to merge adjacent surfaces during export. This can reduce file size but may affect geometry fidelity.

method.name: set_model_space_units
method.description: Sets the model space units for the IGES file. Common values: "MM", "M", "IN", "FT".

method.name: set_model_units
method.description: Sets the model units for the IGES file. Common values: "MM", "M", "IN", "FT".

method.name: set_optimize_curves
method.description: Sets whether to optimize curves during export. Optimization can improve file size and compatibility.

method.name: set_organization
method.description: Sets the organization name to be included in the IGES file header.

method.name: set_precision_value
method.description: Sets the precision value for geometric calculations. Lower values provide higher precision but larger file sizes.

method.name: set_preprocessor_version
method.description: Sets the preprocessor version string included in the IGES file header.

method.name: set_quality_level
method.description: Sets the overall quality level (1=low, 2=medium, 3=high). This affects precision and tolerance settings automatically.

method.name: set_surface_tolerance
method.description: Sets the tolerance value for surface calculations and optimization.

method.name: set_system_identifier
method.description: Sets the system identifier for IGES file headers.

method.name: set_unit_scale_factor
method.description: Sets the unit scale factor for unit conversions during export.

method.name: set_validate_on_write
method.description: Sets whether to validate shapes before writing. Validation can catch geometry issues but adds processing time.

method.name: set_write_analytical_surfaces
method.description: Sets whether to write analytical surfaces (planes, cylinders, etc.) as native IGES entities. Provides better accuracy for simple shapes.

method.name: set_write_brep_entities
method.description: Sets whether to include BREP (boundary representation) entities in exported IGES files. Required for complex geometry.

method.name: set_write_colors
method.description: Sets whether to include color information in exported IGES files. Colors improve visualization in CAD systems.

method.name: set_write_isoparametric_curves
method.description: Sets whether to write isoparametric curves to the IGES file. These curves help with surface visualization.

method.name: set_write_layers
method.description: Sets whether to include layer information in exported IGES files. Useful for organizing complex assemblies.

method.name: set_write_names
method.description: Sets whether to include shape names in exported IGES files. Names help identify components in CAD systems.

method.name: set_write_parameter_space_curves
method.description: Sets whether to write parameter space curves to the IGES file. These curves define surface boundaries.

method.name: set_write_precision_mode
method.description: Sets whether to use precision mode for geometric calculations. Precision mode provides more accurate geometry representation.

method.name: set_write_trimmed_surfaces
method.description: Sets whether to include trimmed surfaces in exported IGES files. Trimmed surfaces provide accurate boundary representation.

method.name: validate_shape_for_iges
method.description: Validates whether a shape is suitable for IGES export. Returns true if the shape can be exported successfully.

method.name: write_shape
method.description: Writes a single shape to an IGES file. Returns true on success, false on failure. Check get_last_error() for error details.

method.name: write_shapes
method.description: Writes multiple shapes to a single IGES file as a compound shape. All shapes are combined into one geometry entity.

method.name: write_shapes_with_colors
method.description: Writes multiple shapes with associated colors to an IGES file. Colors array should contain Vector3 values (RGB 0-1).

method.name: write_shapes_with_layers
method.description: Writes multiple shapes with associated layer names to an IGES file. Layer names help organize components in CAD systems.

method.name: write_with_metadata
method.description: Writes a shape with additional metadata to an IGES file. Metadata dictionary can contain author, organization, and description information.
